name: Promotional Package
description:
spruce your business up!
make it legit!

250 Business Cards
100 postcards
50 rack cards
1 banner
50 letterhead/50 envelopes

Choose 4 items for your business and get full design services, printing, and shipping costs included

*special basic package starting at $100

*all items prices subject to change upon custom order
*alternative custom items available upon request

What to do:
1. email contact/what to include:
a. list the 4 or more items you are interested purchasing,
b. the information you would like on your promotional items,
c. if you have an idea you would like me to work with, give as much of a description as you like
d. your name, contact information, and shipping profile
e. any special extra information

samanthalee3210@gmail.com

2. i will e-mail you back promptly with a quote and discuss your order and designs and to confirm your order

3. purchase your custom listing here:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/heartofpurple

4. give a few days for completion of design
*i may keep in contact with you throughout for suggestions, or an approval as i go

5. print services will be started directly after confirmation

6. they will ship directly to your home or business

7. snap some pictures so i know how they came out
if you can, post them under buyer appreciation on heartofpurple on etsy. or send them to me in an e-mail

8. pass out your new promotional items and watch your business bloom!

Estimated time for completion is less than 1 month, faster turn around time upon request

*not enough? ask about my t-shirt services!
